name: queensuit
description: A Queen blob molded to act as an oversuit. It's adaptive intelligence provides many benefits, not least of which is it's internal climate control. You have the unnerving idea that it's somehow learning from you and the way you move. The queen can be agitated to activate combat mode... If she's been fed.

use_action.need_charges_msg: The %s is out of blob feed.

name: queensuit - combat mode
description: A Queen blob molded to act as an oversuit. It's adaptive intelligence provides many benefits, not least of which is it's internal climate control. You have the unnerving idea that it's somehow learning from you and the way you move. This queen has been incited into combat mode, and is consuming blob-feed to enhance your close combat abilities.

name: Slime enviro suit
description: This is a gloople frame that has been transformed into a skin tight suit and combined with a gelectrode. While it is slightly squishy on the inside and seems reluctant to let you take it off it does seem to keep you at a comfortable temperature. It is currently dormant, use it to wake it up.

use_action.need_charges_msg: The %s is out of blob feed.

name: Slime enviro suit (on)
description: This is a gloople frame that has been transformed into a skin tight suit and combined with a gelectrode. While it is slightly squishy on the inside and seems reluctant to let you take it off it does seem to keep you at a comfortable temperature. It occasionally makes soft gurgling sounds as it digests it's blob feed. Use it to make it go dormant.

name: large slimy pouch
description: A large number of blob globs formed into a huge backpack. It holds onto the items within somewhat tightly and burps loudly whenever you put large amounts of stuff in it at a time.
